name: Silver Oak Health
description: Established in 2015, Silver Oak Health is one of the leading Employee Assistance Program (EAP) service provider in the country. The company is based in Bangalore and uses intellectual property from best known Clinical Psychologists and research institutions around the world to develop digital products in India, and provides affordable solutions to customers. Silver Oak Health is an ISO 27001:2013 certified company. Silver Oak Health is providing EAP services to over 200 corporate clients and serves over a million lives in the country. The company provides innovative tools like the EWAP portal and a contemporary app for employees to access counsellors, as well as a digital dashboard for HR managers to monitor the utilisation of EAP services by employees.

enhanced_description: Silver Oak Health, established in 2015 and headquartered in Bangalore, is a leading Employee Assistance Program (EAP) provider in India. They leverage intellectual property from renowned Clinical Psychologists and research institutions globally to develop affordable digital products. The company is ISO 27001:2013 certified, underscoring its commitment to maintaining the highest standards of information security. Serving over 200 corporate clients and supporting more than a million lives across the country, Silver Oak Health offers holistic EAP services. These services include phone and face-to-face counseling, workshops, and digital stress management programs. Their innovative digital tools comprise an EWAP portal and a contemporary mobile app for employees to easily access counsellors, along with a digital dashboard for HR managers to monitor EAP service utilization. Silver Oak Health is trusted by companies of all sizes across India to build resilient, mindful, and safe organizations, aiming to improve overall employee happiness and engagement.
